overview: This is a truly great flick, the way the "dirt bag" Phillies turn the city of Philadephia upside down with there exciting, never quit play is awesome. This movie shows how a professional club can play as a team and win as a team, which is rare in this world of 100 million dollar contracts, greed, and playing for ME instead of WE. The background music kicks ass as well. Buy this today.
title: Whatever It Takes, Dude
